abstract: Fox won the American television rights to the World Cup in 2018 and 2022 by out-bidding ESPN, while Telemundo got the Spanish-language rights.
snippet: Fox won the American television rights to the World Cup in 2018 and 2022 by out-bidding ESPN, while Telemundo got the Spanish-language rights.

headline.main: Fox Outbids ESPN for World Cup Rights
